document.docAuthor: Chani-Posse, Mariana, Newton, Alfred F., Hansen, Aslak Kappel & Solodovnikov, Alexey
document.masterDocTitle: Checklist and taxonomic changes for Central and South American Philonthina (Coleoptera: Staphylinidae)

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: Checklist and taxonomic changes for Central and South American Philonthina (Coleoptera: Staphylinidae)

bibRefCitation.refString: Bernhauer, M. (1906) Neue Staphyliniden aus Sudamerika. 3. Stuck. Verhandlungen der Kaiserlich-Koniglichen Zoologisch- Botanischen Gesellschaft in Wien, 56, 322 - 339.

paragraph.treatmentCitationGroup:
Leptopeltus
Bernhauer 1906 : 337
. Type species:
Philonthus flavipennis Erichson, 1840
, designated by
Lucas (1920: 371)
.

subSubSection.paragraph:
Note:
Leptopeltus
is a Neotropical Andean genus with five species currently known ( Chani-Posse & Asenjo 2013 ).

Leptopeltus divisus ( Sharp 1891 )
,
comb. nov.
( Figs. 43–44 )

paragraph.treatmentCitationGroup:
Philonthus divisus
Sharp 1891 : 41
. Type locality: Machachi (
9–10000 ft
). Type depository: BMNH HT ♀ . Distribution : Ecuador
.

subSubSection.paragraph: Remarks. The “unique” specimen in BMNH is confirmed as the holotype .

Type material examined.
Holotype ♀ ( BMNH , Figs. 43–44 ): card-mounted, “ ♂ (in ink) Philonthus divisus Type D.S.
Ecuador
9–10000 ft . Whymper” [in Sharp’s hand] // Type (round white label with red margin) //
Ecuador
(white label) // B. C. A. Col. I. 2. Philonthus divisus, Sharp. (white label) // Sharp Coll. 1905.-313. (white label)”.

Comments. The holotype we examined agrees in every respect with
Leptopeltus carchiensis Chani-Posse & Asenjo 2013
and therefore we propose this name as a new junior synonym (new synonymy) of
Philonthus divisus Sharp 1891
. We also transfer
P. divisus
to the genus
Leptopeltus Bernhauer
, as
Leptopeltus divisus (Sharp)
, new combination .

paragraph.treatmentCitationGroup:
=
Leptopeltus carchiensis
Chani-Posse & Asenjo 2013 : 446
,
syn. nov.
Type locality: Ecuador
:
Carchi , San Gabriel, approx 15 km E, Reserva Biologica Guandera,
3300–3450 m
, 0°35'11"N , 77°44'37"W . Type depository: SEMC HT ♂ . Distribution : Ecuador
.

Philonthus flavipennis
Erichson 1840 : 460
. Type depository: ZMHB LT ♂ , 3 PLT . Type locality: Bogotae in Columbia interiore; Bogota [LT]. Distribution: Venezuela , Colombia ,
Ecuador
, Peru , Bolivia . Notes: comb. nov. ex
Philonthus (
Bernhauer 1906: 338
)
; Peru ( Asenjo 2004 ); lectotype designation, redescription, distribution (
Chani-Posse & Asenjo 2013: 447
).

Leptopeltus montivagans
Bernhauer 1906 : 339
. Type locality: Hochanden, 4000m , Bolivia . Type depository: NMW HT ♀ . Distribution: Bolivia , Peru . Note: redescription and distribution (
Chani-Posse & Asenjo 2013: 449
).

Leptopeltus netolitskyi
Bernhauer 1906 : 338
. Type locality: La Paz , 3800m , Bolivien [LT]. Type depository: FMNH LT ♀ . Distribution: Bolivia , Argentina . Note: lectotype designation, redescription, distribution (Chani-
Posse & Asenjo 2013 : 449
).
